entry.title: Stewart Park Bridge is closed to pedestrians on Wednesday
entry.summary: The Stewart Park Bridge will be closed to all foot and bicycle traffic 6 a.m. until about 7 p.m. Wednesday as part of the roadway resurfacing of the rehabilitation project that has closed regular bridge traffic since February.

entry.title: Douglas County Man Charged After Video Shows Dog Attacking Injured Deer
entry.summary: A Douglas County man faces felony animal abuse charges after a viral video showed him laughing as his dog attacked an injured deer in Sutherlin. Oregon State Police say the footage sparked public outrage and led to charges of aggravated animal abuse and harassing wildlife.

entry.title: Roseburg City Council findings released, after a nine month long investigation
entry.summary: An investigation launched nine months ago in Roseburg is finally completed and is being released to the public. Mayor Larry Rich requested the investigation in January after former city council member Kylee Rummel abruptly resigned.
